name: Malware-Fytes
description:
Malware-Fytes is a wave-based survival First-Person Shooter.  With your precious data in danger, you've entered the virtual world where malicious viruses are destroying your files one-by-one! Fight to keep your data tiles around for as long as you can!

Features:

  • Melee and Ranged attack options! Save ammo by getting up close and personal or stop wasting time and shoot before the ground is completely gone!
  • Dynamic music system with growing intensity to match wave difficulty!
  • Infinite enemy waves! All enemy types will appear in random assortments after Wave 10! How far can you get?

Please see the included demo video for an overview of the enemy types. Thank you and please enjoy!

TAGD Spring 2021 Game Jam Submission
